title: In game bug.
body: In game there is a bug where it will not show me the champion level or summoner names (with it checked to show me names in the options). i've tried restarting my computer and rebooting league multiple times, but every time in game it will not show me levels next to the in game health bar above their heads or their name above the health bar.[](http://file:///C:/Users/Jai/Pictures/Bugs.jpg)

replies.body: sounds like you need to do a repair install
